### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Chests at various positions
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5) 
-  Chest (position x=-16.5, y=-49.5) 

### Inserter systems at various positions
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel to operate
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill is placed near the resource to be mined

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel to operate
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace output is not full

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to operate
-  Ensure that the boiler is connected to a pipe group

### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a pipe group
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a fluid input

### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group

### Errors when using pipe groups
-  Ensure that the pipe group is connected to the required entities
-  Ensure that the pipe group has the required fluid

### Errors when using electricity groups
-  Ensure that the electricity group is connected to the required entities
-  Ensure that the electricity group has the required voltage
